page.title: 02BARCOMBE NEWS.
page.content: This is a local news sheet produced by the Parish Church and distributed free to every household in the village on a monthly basis.The following are news items taken from the June edition: {Calling all Cyclists.} There is to be a sponsored Bike Ride on Saturday 7th to raise money for the Sussex Historic Churches Trust and your own church or the Save the Children Fund. {Barcombe Parish Council.} The Annual Parish Meeting was held on the 26th April.Points discussed at question time covered:crop spraying, Civil Emergency Plan,speed restriction signs in the village and grass verges destroyed by workmen. {Crime Alert Comes to Barcombe. Crime Alert/Neighbourhood Watch will start in the parish on Mon 3rd June.
